message: Let's be fair and reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Your 60-40 split seems a bit off to me, how about we meet in the middle at 55-45?
I can do 58-42, it's as low as I'm willing to go for now.
This is getting us nowhere. 50-50 isn't fair considering the inflation, so I'm proposing 48-52. Take it or leave it.
Considering the inflation, my 57-43 offer is more than generous. Think about the future value.
This is ridiculous. I'm taking a firm stance. 50-50 is the only fair split given the rapidly devaluing money. Let's end this.
